类 Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
This class manages player accounts, parental controls, and gameplay time tracking. It provides functionality for password protection, time limit enforcement, and gameplay statistics tracking. The class uses a singleton pattern to ensure global settings are consistent across all instances, storing configuration in a persistent .dat file. Key features include: - Password-protected parental controls - Configurable gameplay time restrictions - Play time tracking and statistics - Pet revival functionality for parent accounts
作者:
Haoxuan Suo 251103783 hsuo3

  • 方法详细资料

    • setGlobalPassword

      public static boolean setGlobalPassword(String password)
      Sets global password (can only be set once)
      参数:
      password - new password to set
      返回:
      whether successfully set

    • isGlobalPasswordInitialized

      public static boolean isGlobalPasswordInitialized()
      Checks if global password has been initialized
      返回:
      true if password has been set, false otherwise

    • verifyGlobalPassword

      public static boolean verifyGlobalPassword(String enteredPassword)
      Verifies if the entered password matches the global password
      参数:
      enteredPassword - the password to verify
      返回:
      true if password matches, false otherwise

      返回:
      whether successfully reset

    • startPlaying

      public boolean startPlaying(Player.TimeCheckCallback callback)
      Starts gameplay tracking and time checking
      参数:
      callback - interface to notify about time restriction events
      返回:
      true if allowed to play, false otherwise

    • setParentalControls

      public boolean setParentalControls(boolean enabled, String playTimeLimit)
      Sets parental control settings
      参数:
      enabled - whether parental controls are enabled
      playTimeLimit - time range when gameplay is allowed (format: "HH:MM - HH:MM")
      返回:
      true if settings were applied successfully, false otherwise

      返回:
      true if reset successful, false otherwise
